structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The county may provide the county surveyor with an office at the county seat, and with record books. The records shall be county property and shall be kept in the office of the surveyor or the county clerk.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4672a-5.
